Contact Blackhorn Ventures

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”7px” module_id=”Trevor” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Denver Office

1615 Platte St

Denver, CO 80202

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

New York Office

195 Broadway, 20th Floor

NY, NY 10007

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”65%” max_width=”65%” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”65%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Age of Efficiency Text” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get in touch with us

We work with individuals and teams accelerating the energy transition. If you think Blackhorn could be the right partner for you, or you’re interested in our latest market insights, portfolio company updates, or opportunities to co-invest with us, fill out the form below.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_tabs active_tab_text_color=”#7DCBB6″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” tab_font=”|600|||||||” tab_font_size=”16px” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_tab title=”General Updates” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you would like to receive general updates about Blackhorn Ventures like news, blog posts, events, etc. please use this form.

 

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Invest In Blackhorn” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you are interested in investing in the Blackhorn Ventures fund, please use this form.

 

[/et_pb_tab][/et_pb_tabs][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Denver” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Policy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Twitter-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://twitter.com/blackhornvc” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Twitter” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/YouTube-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH9wQgFr5goz-lf9nsjE0pw” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Youtube Icon” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/LinkedIn-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/company/blackhorn-ventures/” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Linkedin icon” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
